name: Mutant Reindeer Pizza Adventure
description:
Follow the adventures of four young reindeer on their path of becoming ninja, in this harrowing tale of elves, pizza and things that end in -olly.

The game is of the kinetic novel type, which means that you can kick back and relax,  no stressful decision-making required. The reading duration is about 15 minutes, so there's good news for all of you with little spare time here too.

The game was created in about a month as a practice project to come to grips with the Ren'Py engine back in 2017 and saw a limited release in German later the same year. After gathering dust on my hard drive for half a decade I can now finally present a version for international audiences.
